QuestData.Title: A Centaur's Best Friend
QuestData.Description:
It isn't safe for us to remain in the open, $p.
The gorlocs forced my hunting companion, Baba, into a cave to the east.
Set me free, then we shall rescue Baba. I will meet you in the cave when the path is clear.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Khasar and meet him in the cave.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thank you, $p. We are safe in here and can speak freely.
I will protect Baba from any gorlocs that dare venture in while he rests.
